game.name: Princess Sorority Pledges
game.description:
Today is the first day of college for these four beautiful princesses Ariel, Anna, Elsa and Jasmine.  So they have made out a big plan to make it more special. Hey ladies! This time you do not have to dress them up with the cool outfits like you did in the previous awesome dressing games for girls. But, you have to help them to prepare a sorority program. Are you ready friends? Join Princess Sorority Pledges and be prepared to guide them to pass all the pledges Maleficent has come for them!
It is not going to be easy at all since you need to put your logical skills and memory abilities to the test discover all the tasks clever lady has prepared for your favorite Disney queens. Get ready to handle the first pledge that is a scrapbook creation in this cool girls game! Select the coolest patterns, photos and decoration accessories to make their sorority scrapbook look perfect! Make sure to test your memory skills in the next challenge. 
Your job is to recreate the family of sorority tree by staying focused on the screen. Keep staring the tree for a couple of seconds and then you have to drag and drop each family member to the position she belongs to before. Your favorite princess Ariel is waiting for your help then in decorating a cute paddle. Further, you have to complete a fun hidden objects challenge and then challenge your fashion ability to prepare an awesome sorority look for her.
